text: Chuck Burley (born January 10, 1956) is an American Republican politician who served in the Oregon House of Representatives from 2005 until 2009. ==Career== Burley moved to Bend, Oregon in 1993, and served as a U.S. Forest Service official. He was elected to the 73rd Oregon Legislative Assembly in 2004, and served until 2009, when he was defeated by Democrat Judy Stiegler. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Oregon House of Representatives Category:Oregon Republicans Category:Colorado State University alumni Category:Politicians from Bend, Oregon Category:Politicians from Cleveland Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Chuck Burley
